comment_body: Said the preacher as he sits in his Bentley, getting a bj from a sex worker, parked in front of the hospital that is  housing his wife that is dying of cancer.

A quick fun one. Happy Thursday.

Edit: alt ending:

Hi guys! This has been a message from *‘Cause I Flay*. Remember to like and subscribe for tips on preparing flesh for even removal and check out our merch store for antibiotic salves, balms and ointments. 

And…the wait is over! My cookbook, Flayvore, is set to release this week! Use discount code FLAYBELLS21 at checkout for 10% off and be entered to win two Christmas stockings with a toenail polish of your choosing. Merry ex-mass!

Love the little copyright easter egg at the end  ;)

Thanks MJ! I think I was really just feeling my inner Jonathan swift with this. The copyright is fluff. Fighting sexual expression with violence is the real horror, and one that seems disturbingly possible to me.
